products.title: Harrow Lagoon Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Smooth texture and suave shade are combined in this beautiful, trendy fabric. The gentle teal shade is cool and really fashionable right now.  This colour combines really well with greys and darker blues, for a truly contemporary look that zings with understated vibrance. Throw i

products.title: Harrow Caribbean Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
Fancy casting away to the warmth of the caribbean sea? This harrow blind will take you there, with its exotic teal shade youll feel like youre in paradise every time you roll it down.

Its easy to see why teal has been such a big colour in the design world over the past few

products.title: Harrow Navy Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
With the look of smooth denim, and a sophisticated finish, the harrow navy roman blind is a lovely addition to family homes that are in need of trendy shading.  
Its tonal qualities bring a real sense of charm and character to the fabric, giving the room in which it hangs depth

products.title: Harrow Lagoon Blue & Henley Trimmed Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Add a bit of colour and life to your home with this beautiful eternity linen blue roman blind and its coordinated henley trim, with little woollen tassels. ?
